title: Ping issue in Toronto
body:
When i run a ping test on the ip address 104.160.131.1 i have got like 50 ms. However in game i usually have an average of 110 - 150.

I mean I understand the port handle ping request is differ from the port running accrual game. There should be more traffic on the port running the game lead to more delay. But it should not be that significant.

And i play other game like Warthunder or First Assault with only 15 ms ping usually.

Any potential problem?

Thanks
8d8a68ee_8463

replies.body: If your routing to the NA region is solid, then there might be more local issues causing your ping to increase.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities and test it out in a custom game.  Let me know the results!
